conversations.content:
<think>
Alright, the user just said "hi." I need to respond in a friendly and helpful way. Since they're at the beginning of our conversation, maybe they're new or just starting to engage.

I should acknowledge their greeting and offer assistance. It's good to keep it open-ended so they know what options are available to them.

I'll mention the types of help I can provide—explaining concepts, solving coding problems, or discussing ideas. Keeping it concise but inviting for further conversation.
</think>

Hello! How can I assist you today? Whether you have a question about coding, AI, or just want to chat, I'm here to help! 😊
